00018 ARPPacket::ARPPacket(const OpcodeType      opcode,

00047 bool ARPPacket::IsIPToEthernet() const
00048 {
00049     ARPHWAddressSpaceType hw, proto;
00050     EthernetProtocol eproto;
00051 
00052     EthernetHeader header = FindHeader(Headers::EthernetHeader);
00053 
00054     header.GetProtocolType(eproto);
00055 
00056     if (eproto != PROTO_ARP) {
00057         return false;
00058     }
00059 
00060     GetHWAddressSpace(hw);
00061     GetProtocolAddressSpace(proto);
00062     
00063     return ((hw == ETHERNET_HW_ADXSPACE) && (proto == IP_PROTO_ADXSPACE));
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool ARPPacket::IsIPToEthernetRequest() const
00067 {
00068     OpcodeType oc;
00069 
00070     GetOpcode(oc);
00071 
00072     return (IsIPToEthernet() && (oc == Request)) ;
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool ARPPacket::IsIPToEthernetReply() const
00076 {
00077     OpcodeType oc;
00078 
00079     GetOpcode(oc);
00080 
00081     return (IsIPToEthernet() && (oc == Reply)) ;
00082 }

00084 void ARPPacket::GetHWAddressSpace(ARPHWAddressSpaceType &haddr) const
00085 {
00086     payload.GetData((char *)&haddr, 2, 0);
00087     haddr = ntohs(haddr);
00088 }

00130 void ARPPacket::GetOpcode(OpcodeType &opcode) const
00131 {
00132     ARPOpcodeType oc;
00133 
00134     payload.GetData((char *)&oc, 2, 6);
00135     oc = ntohs(oc);
00136     opcode = (oc == ARP_REQUEST_OPCODE) ? Request : Reply;
00137 }
00138 
00139 void ARPPacket::SetOpcode(const OpcodeType &opcode)
00140 {
00141     ARPOpcodeType oc = (opcode==Request) ? ARP_REQUEST_OPCODE : ARP_REPLY_OPCODE;
00142     oc = htons(oc);
00143     payload.SetData((const char *)&oc, 2, 6);
00144 }

00204 std::ostream &ARPPacket::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00205 {
00206     ARPHWAddressSpaceType    hwadxspace;
00207     ARPProtoAddressSpaceType protoadxspace;
00208     ARPHWAddressLenType      hwlen;
00209     ARPProtoAddressLenType   protolen;
00210     EthernetAddr             senderhw, targethw;
00211     IPAddress                senderip, targetip;
00212     OpcodeType               opcode;
00213 
00214     GetHWAddressSpace(hwadxspace);
00215     GetProtocolAddressSpace(protoadxspace);
00216     GetHWAddressLen(hwlen);
00217     GetProtoAddressLen(protolen);
00218     GetSenderEthernetAddr(senderhw);
00219     GetSenderIPAddr(senderip);
00220     GetTargetEthernetAddr(targethw);
00221     GetTargetIPAddr(targetip);
00222     GetOpcode(opcode);
00223 
00224     os << "ARP(hwaddrspace="   << hwadxspace 
00225        << ", protoaddrspace="  << protoadxspace
00226        << ", hwlen="           << (int)hwlen 
00227        << ", protolen="        << (int)protolen
00228        << ", opcode="          << ((opcode == Request) ? "Request" : "Reply")
00229        << ", senderhw="        << senderhw 
00230        << ", senderip="        << senderip
00231        << ", targethw="        << targethw 
00232        << ", targetip="        << targetip
00233        << ")";
00234     
00235   return os;
00236 }

00267 void ARPRequestResponse::Serialize(const int fd) const
00268 {
00269     if (writeall(fd, (const char *)&ipaddr, sizeof(ipaddr)) != sizeof(ipaddr)) {
00270         throw SerializationException();
00271     }
00272 
00273     ethernetaddr.Serialize(fd);
00274 
00275     if (writeall(fd, (const char *)&flag, sizeof(flag)) != sizeof(flag)) {
00276         throw SerializationException();
00277     }
00278 }
00279 
00280 
00281 void ARPRequestResponse::Unserialize(const int fd)
00282 {
00283     if (readall(fd, (char *)&ipaddr, sizeof(ipaddr)) != sizeof(ipaddr)) {
00284         throw SerializationException();
00285     }
00286 
00287     ethernetaddr.Unserialize(fd);
00288 
00289     if (readall(fd, (char *)&flag, sizeof(flag)) != sizeof(flag)) {
00290         throw SerializationException();
00291     }
00292 }

00294 std::ostream & ARPRequestResponse::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00295 {
00296     os << "ARPRequestResponse"
00297        << "( ipaddr="        << ipaddr 
00298        << ", ethernetaddr="  << ethernetaddr
00299        << ", flag="          << ((int)flag)
00300        << " "
00301        << ((flag == REQUEST)          ? "REQUEST" :
00302            (flag == RESPONSE_OK)      ? "RESPONSE_OK" :
00303            (flag == RESPONSE_UNKNOWN) ? "RESPONSE_UNKNOWN" :
00304            "UNKNOWN_FLAG") 
00305        << ")";
00306     
00307   return os;
00308 }

00316 void ARPCache::Lookup(ARPRequestResponse &x) const
00317 {
00318     DataType::const_iterator i = data.find(x.ipaddr);
00319     
00320     if (i == data.end()) {
00321         x.flag = ARPRequestResponse::RESPONSE_UNKNOWN;
00322     } else {
00323         x = (*i).second;
00324     }
00325 }
00326 
00327 void ARPCache::Delete(const IPAddress &ipaddr)
00328 {
00329     data.erase(data.find(ipaddr));
00330 }

00338 std::ostream & ARPCache::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00339 {
00340     os << "ARPCache" << "( size=" << data.size();
00341 
00342     os << " contents={";    
00343     for_each(data.begin(), data.end() ,PrintFunc<std::pair<IPAddress,ARPRequestResponse> >(os));
